page-onboarding.intro: Are you ready to awaken your home, reclaim your privacy and join a worldwide community of tinkerers?

user.intro: Let's get started by creating a user account.

core-config.intro: Helo {name}, croeso i Home Assistant. Sut hoffech enwi eich t≈∑?
core-config.intro_location: Hoffem wybod ble rydych chi'n byw. Bydd y wybodaeth yn helpu i arddangos gwybodaeth a sefydlu awtomeiddiadau haul. Tydi'r data byth yn cael ei rannu thu allan i'ch rhwydwaith.
core-config.intro_location_detect: Gallwn eich helpu i lenwi'r wybodaeth hon drwy wneud cais un-tro i wasanaeth allanol.

integration.intro: Cynrychiolir dyfeisiau a gwasanaethau yn Home Assistant fel integreiddiadau. Gallwch eu gosod nawr, neu'n ddiweddarach o'r sgrin ffurfweddu.

restore.description: Alternatively you can restore from a previous backup.
restore.name: Backup name
